extDescription.message: Forwards requests to .onion and .exit tlds to a tor proxy

not_configured.message: dotOnion IS NOT configured and will not work! Please see the "Settings" tab to configure!

useExternal.message: The Tor SOCKS server is running on this computer:

useLocal.message: The Tor SOCKS server is running on a different computer:

about_top.message: dotOnion is a simple tor proxy handler, made for those who just want to access .onion domains, but do not need extra security/privacy.

about_mid.message: If you are using dotOnion for privacy, I highly recommend getting the Tor Browser instead. It is a lot more secure as it does other stuff to protect your privacy, dotOnion is only intended for letting you access tor sites, it doesn't add any security layers.

about_crafted.message: dotOnion is hand crafted by Hyenas, with love! :3
